page.title: 07KILMERSDON HOUSING
page.content: Estate cottages represent about half of Kilmersdon homes. The owner of the estate has formed a Housing Assoc. to which he has given most of the properties and a programme of modernisation is under way. A central development of 7 old peoples bungalows with a warden's house and meeting room has been completed in l985. Kilmerdon village has just been designated as a conservation area. Many privately owned houses were cottages bought from the Estate and updated, in some cases two or more being converted to make quite large and attractive houses. A small number of council houses remain, others having been bought by the occupants. ll new houses have been built since the war the first ever in Kilmersdon on freehold land bought from the Estate.
